Banner.Description: I have 3 years of experience developing clean and reusable applications, tools, and software solutions to digital interactions. I focus on writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code with Angular at home and C++ at school, applying industry best practices and modern development techniques.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Hi there! I'm Michael and I'm a third-year student at the University of Waterloo. I bring over a year of internships at RBC, and love to eagerly learn and develop to expand my coding skills!
I am able to continuously implement improvements in creating websites, and suggesting and executing projects to the project that I'm working on.
In my free time, I love to play video games, especially Super Smash Bros Ultimate and Cyberpunk 2077. I also love immersing myself in anime and manga, both watching and reading it!
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include(but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer
Description: Developed and maintained projects and REST APIs utilizing Angular, Spring Boot, and Postman for the Digital Development Security Team
Engineered a detailed web application with Angular and Spring Boot to decode JSON web tokens and provide additional infomration about RBC security tokens
Architected and implemented a token onboarding portal across multiple development environments using Redis, Docker, and Openshift

Experience.Jobs.Title: Junior Analyst/Associate
Description: Designed and implemented projects using C# with ASP.NET MVC 5 and MS SQL for the Law Group Technology Team
Demonstrated proficiency in data analysis and visualization through the use of Tableau to extract meaningful insights from various sources
Engineered and implemented automated solutions, including the development of Excel Macros using Visual Basic, resulting in substantial time savings and heightened efficiency

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Quizlr
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An Android app that lets you quiz yourself about Video Games, Sports, History, and the University of Waterloo!

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Typing Test
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A website that can assess a user's typing speed through common and popular phrases with the option for the user to create their own sentence to type against!

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Word Solver
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A web application that can solve word searches given either a text or image word search!

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: SpooderSnek-42(Battlesnakes)
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A very spoopy snake to be used on the Battlesnakes platform utilizing flood fill and A* search algorithms.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Chip 8 Emulator
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A small emulator used to play Chip-8 games.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: Feel free to contact me if you have any questions for me or just want to say hi!
